response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value and significance for both parties involved. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits, we believe it is worth every penny of the $1,500,000 asking price. This opportunity not only secures an investment in a high-return asset but also opens doors to potential future collaborations and advancements. We are confident that this product will significantly contribute to your endeavors and elevate your position in the industry. Let's embark on this journey together and create a mutually beneficial partnership. If you're ready to take the next step, please confirm your acceptance.", "product_price": 1500000}
